title: Do we really need this? Does anyone actually care?
review:
This is quite possibly THE most pointless documentary ever created, which is especially surprising considering its talented creator.

Well made in regards to direction, production, etc, but seriously, who cares about this? Honestly, without any intent on being rude, and purely from an objective standpoint, why was there a documentary created about this person? It holds the same interest as it would for any random person on the planet.

Every person in the world has a "story". Welcome to humanity, we don't all need a documentary.

title: confirms what i knew about him
review: The douche is back on flattering himself on the big screen. i wonder who came for the premiere.
